title: Child of Baltimore
description: What would you do if your every move was controlled by your parents? What if you were denied the company of friends or any contact with your immediate family? What if you were raised to believe that your sole prupose in life was to become a religious pioneer?What if your mother and brother were arrested and charged with the brutal beating death of your father? What if your entire life was marked by tragedy after tragedy? What would you do? Child of Baltimore is the compelling true story of a young woman growing up in the ultimate of dysfunctional families. Surrounded by siblings and parents as troubled as she, Tial had to find a way to confront the demons of her past, head on, and change the expected course of her life. Determined to find answers at any cost, she takes matters in her own hands to pursue what future, if any, she holds. Child of Baltimore is a rare, bold account of a life damaged by drug abuse, physical and emotional abuse. It is a glimpse into a life destroyed and a life reconstructed.
author: Tia Lincoln
